summary: A heavily neurotic young man starts to see his father's ghost, and while he helps the spirit cross to the otherworld, something happens that they could never achieve in their common life: they finally understand each other.
cast: Márton Kristóf|Zsolt Anger|Eszter Csákányi|József Gyabronka|László Gálffi|Gergely Kocsis|Zsolt Kovács|Andrea Petrik|Ferenc Pusztai|Szabolcs Thuróczy
title: Utóélet
